channel.title: Help with a client
channel.description:
[s]Okay, i havnt been on moparscape, in well....a very long time. Basically, ive been "trying" to code servers on and off, starting from blanks. I always end up running into problems, so i got sick of it, And rather just be called a leecher. So now im just taking all stars source, and changing it up a BIT, not a whole lot. Just enough to feel i have a right to call it partially mine.
ANYWAY, there lies a problem..... I need a client that runs with all star's source. Ive been spending the last past 2 days looking up and down the server downloads section, and making constant use of the search bar. All i require is a client that Runs with allstar, So with that said, Can someone give me some clues of where i could get one? Im not saying to post a link, im just saying if u know a source that had a client link, and u think it would work, to give me the name of it, and ill find it myself.
(not sure if what i just put up is aginst the rules :O) Thanks for reading, wuvs ya all =][/s]
crap , posted in wrong section. SORRY! im fixing that right now!

item.title: Help with a client
item.dc:creator: @Ahyo Ahyo
item.description:
@Ahyo wrote:

[s]Okay, i havnt been on moparscape, in well…a very long time. Basically, ive been “trying” to code servers on and off, starting from blanks. I always end up running into problems, so i got sick of it, And rather just be called a leecher. So now im just taking all stars source, and changing it up a BIT, not a whole lot. Just enough to feel i have a right to call it partially mine.

ANYWAY, there lies a problem… I need a client that runs with all star’s source. Ive been spending the last past 2 days looking up and down the server downloads section, and making constant use of the search bar. All i require is a client that Runs with allstar, So with that said, Can someone give me some clues of where i could get one? Im not saying to post a link, im just saying if u know a source that had a client link, and u think it would work, to give me the name of it, and ill find it myself.

(not sure if what i just put up is aginst the rules :O) Thanks for reading, wuvs ya all =][/s]
